abstract: Procter & Gamble has hired the Blackstone Group to explore a sale of its Duracell batteries, Pringles chips and Folgers and Millstone coffee businesses, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble has hired the Blackstone Group to explore a sale of its Duracell batteries, Pringles chips and Folgers and Millstone coffee businesses, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Procter & Gamble Said to Hire Blackstone for Asset Sales
